newsitem.title: SWITZERLAND: Ciba rights offer proceeds for Novartis.
newsitem.headline: Ciba rights offer proceeds for Novartis.

text.p: Ciba Specialty Chemicals, which is being spun off from Novartis AG, said it will use "substantially all" the proceeds from its pending Rights Offering to repay an advance from Novartis.
In accordance with its spin-off agreement, Novartis transferred cash and cash equivalents and marketable securities to Ciba Specialty amounting to 700 million Swiss francs, Ciba said.
Ciba Specialty has also assumed interest bearing debt from Novartis totalling one billion francs.
In addition, Novartis transferred 165 million francs to Ciba Specialty in anticipation of restructuring costs which the specialty chemicals company may incur after January 1, 1997.
